sentences.english: Of them have been selected to exhibit at Pingyao with lots of attention and disputation .

sentences.english: Pingyao of Shanxi Province was built 2000 years ago during the Zhou Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 山西平遥古城建于2000年前的周朝。

sentences.english: The Ancient City of Pingyao is a World Heritage Site near Taiyuan.
sentences.chinese: 平遥古城是世界文化遗产，位于太原附近。

sentences.english: The Pingyao Ancient Cily and Yungang Grottoes are listed as The World Culture Relics.
sentences.chinese: 平遥古城和云冈石窟被列为世界文化遗产。
